20101221010031.000|20101221010033.000|CC1|EDUCATIONAL DEGREES AND HAD BEEN
20101221010033.000|20101221010036.000|CC1|A WASHINGTON REDSKINS NFL       
20101221010036.000|20101221010037.000|CC1|CHEERLEADER.                    
20101221010037.000|20101221010039.000|CC1|SHE PURSUES HER DREAMS MOVING TO
20101221010039.000|20101221010041.000|CC1|VEGAS AND BECOMES A SHOWGIRL.

20101221010045.000|20101221010048.000|CC1|THE LUXOR HOTEL AND CASINO, SHE 
20101221010048.000|20101221010050.000|CC1|GOES MISSING WITHOUT A TRACE.

20101221010223.000|20101221010224.000|CC1|THIS IS A TERRIBLE TRAGEDY.     
20101221010224.000|20101221010225.000|CC1|THIS GIRL DEBBIE HAS BEEN       
20101221010225.000|20101221010227.000|CC1|MISSING FOR OVER A WEEK.        
20101221010227.000|20101221010229.000|CC1|HER SISTER GAVE A HEART-BREAKING

20101221010230.000|20101221010231.000|CC1|THAT SHE DOESN'T BELIEVE HER

20101221010234.000|20101221010234.000|CC1|BOYFRIEND.

20101221010242.000|20101221010243.000|CC1|NOW, THE POLICE HAVE TOLD US HE 
20101221010243.000|20101221010244.000|CC1|IS NOT A PERSON OF INTEREST AND 
20101221010244.000|20101221010245.000|CC1|IN FACT IS COOPERATING WITH     
20101221010245.000|20101221010246.000|CC1|THEM, BUT THIS IS SOMETHING THAT

20101221010259.000|20101221010301.000|CC1|CAN YOU TELL US?

20101221010309.000|20101221010311.000|CC1|THEIR MISSING PERSONS DETAIL.   
20101221010311.000|20101221010311.000|CC1|WE WILL LEARN MORE THEN.

20101221010317.000|20101221010318.000|CC1|SUNDAY NIGHT, THE 12th.

20101221010320.000|20101221010321.000|CC1|SHE DIDN'T SHOW UP FOR WORK ON  
20101221010321.000|20101221010323.000|CC1|THE 13th, THAT'S WHEN HER       
20101221010323.000|20101221010324.000|CC1|CO-WORKERS SAID THAT IS VERY,   
20101221010324.000|20101221010325.000|CC1|VERY UNLIKE HER AND THAT'S WHEN 
20101221010325.000|20101221010326.000|CC1|PEOPLE STARTED GETTING WORRIED, 
20101221010326.000|20101221010328.000|CC1|THAT'S WHEN THEY STARTED        
20101221010328.000|20101221010329.000|CC1|SEARCHING FOR HER CAR, WHICH WAS
20101221010329.000|20101221010331.000|CC1|FOUND LATER IN THE WEEK, WITH   
20101221010331.000|20101221010332.000|CC1|THE LICENSE PLATES REMOVED.     
20101221010332.000|20101221010332.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.                       
20101221010332.000|20101221010334.000|CC1|WE DO UNDERSTAND HER BOYFRIEND  
20101221010334.000|20101221010335.000|CC1|IS COOPERATING WITH POLICE.     
20101221010335.000|20101221010337.000|CC1|THAT IS WHAT THEY ARE SAYING.   
20101221010337.000|20101221010341.000|CC1|LET'S GO BACK TO ALEXIS,        
20101221010341.000|20101221010342.000|CC1|REPORTER FROM RADARONLINE.      
20101221010342.000|20101221010343.000|CC1|TALK TO US ABOUT HER CAR BECAUSE
20101221010343.000|20101221010346.000|CC1|IT WAS ABANDONED QUITE A WAYS   
20101221010346.000|20101221010348.000|CC1|AWAY IN LAS VEGAS FROM WHERE SHE
20101221010348.000|20101221010348.000|CC1|LIVES.                          
20101221010348.000|20101221010350.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT WAS.            
20101221010350.000|20101221010351.000|CC1|IT WAS REALLY IN A RUN-DOWN     
20101221010351.000|20101221010351.000|CC1|NEIGHBORHOOD.                   
20101221010351.000|20101221010352.000|CC1|A WOMAN HAD SEEN IT.            
20101221010352.000|20101221010353.000|CC1|SHE ACTUALLY CALLED THE POLICE, 
20101221010353.000|20101221010354.000|CC1|REPORTED THE CAR ABANDONED.     
20101221010354.000|20101221010357.000|CC1|THEY DIDN'T COME, THEY DIDN'T DO
20101221010357.000|20101221010358.000|CC1|ANYTHING.

20101221010401.000|20101221010402.000|CC1|ANYTHING.

20101221010409.000|20101221010411.000|CC1|AFTER I GUESS A THIRD PHONE

20101221010417.000|20101221010420.000|CC1|WAS AN ABANDONED CAR SO THIS IS 
20101221010420.000|20101221010421.000|CC1|SOMETHING THEY ARE DEFINITELY   
20101221010421.000|20101221010421.000|CC1|SCOURING THIS FOR EVIDENCE.     
20101221010421.000|20101221010423.000|CC1|THIS IS A BIG THING AND IT WAS  
20101221010423.000|20101221010424.000|CC1|MISSING FOR QUITE A FEW DAYS AND
20101221010424.000|20101221010425.000|CC1|EVEN THOUGH THE NEIGHBOR        
20101221010425.000|20101221010426.000|CC1|REPEATEDLY CALLED THE POLICE,   
20101221010426.000|20101221010428.000|CC1|THEY DIDN'T TAKE ACTION ON THIS.
20101221010428.000|20101221010429.000|CC1|>> WHICH IS CONCERNING AS WE

20101221010434.000|20101221010438.000|CC1|TONIGHT ON "NANCY GRACE."       
20101221010438.000|20101221010440.000|CC1|IT IS CELESTE FLORES, THE SISTER
20101221010440.000|20101221010441.000|CC1|OF DEBBIE.                      
20101221010441.000|20101221010444.000|CC1|THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR JOINING   
20101221010444.000|20101221010444.000|CC1|US.

20101221010445.000|20101221010447.000|CC1|GOING THROUGH IN YOUR HEART AND 
20101221010447.000|20101221010448.000|CC1|IN YOUR SOUL.

20101221010449.000|20101221010453.000|CC1|THE POLICE TELLING YOU TONIGHT? 
20101221010453.000|20101221010458.000|CC1|>> RIGHT NOW THEY'RE JUST       
20101221010458.000|20101221010500.000|CC1|FOLLOWING LEADS.                
20101221010500.000|20101221010503.000|CC1|THEY ARE BASICALLY TAKING THINGS
20101221010503.000|20101221010505.000|CC1|SLOW SO THEY DON'T MISS NOTHING,
20101221010505.000|20101221010506.000|CC1|NOT A THING.                    
20101221010506.000|20101221010508.000|CC1|THEY'RE JUST GOING THROUGH EVERY
20101221010508.000|20101221010513.000|CC1|POSSIBLE LEAD, TALKING TO       
20101221010513.000|20101221010513.000|CC1|INDIVIDUALS AND HOPEFULLY       
20101221010513.000|20101221010516.000|CC1|GATHERING MORE INFORMATION.     
20101221010516.000|20101221010518.000|CC1|>> YOUR SISTER'S CAR THAT WAS   
20101221010518.000|20101221010521.000|CC1|FOUND ABANDONED IN NORTH LAS    
20101221010521.000|20101221010523.000|CC1|VEGAS, THEY HAVE THAT CAR, HAVE 
20101221010523.000|20101221010525.000|CC1|THEY TOLD YOU THAT THEY'RE      
20101221010525.000|20101221010527.000|CC1|PROCESSING IT FOR DNA AND       
20101221010527.000|20101221010528.000|CC1|FORENSICALLY, ANYTHING THEY CAN 
20101221010528.000|20101221010529.000|CC1|FIND?                           
20101221010529.000|20101221010533.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101221010533.000|20101221010537.000|CC1|THEY TOLD ME THAT THEY DID FIND 
20101221010537.000|20101221010541.000|CC1|THE CAR, THAT THEY ARE GOING TO 
20101221010541.000|20101221010545.000|CC1|RUN FORENSICS ON IT.            
20101221010545.000|20101221010549.000|CC1|THEY DID FIND A SMALL BAG IN THE
20101221010549.000|20101221010552.000|CC1|CAR.                            
20101221010552.000|20101221010555.000|CC1|IT WAS CONFIRMED IT WAS A MAKEUP
20101221010555.000|20101221010556.000|CC1|BAG.                            
20101221010556.000|20101221010557.000|CC1|AND THAT THEY ALSO ARE RUNNING  
20101221010557.000|20101221010559.000|CC1|IT FOR DNA EVIDENCE AND THEY'RE 
20101221010559.000|20101221010602.000|CC1|RUNNING THROUGH HER PHONE       
20101221010602.000|20101221010603.000|CC1|RECORDS AND THINGS OF THAT      
20101221010603.000|20101221010604.000|CC1|NATURE, HER COMPUTER AND        
20101221010604.000|20101221010605.000|CC1|EVERYTHING, LOOKING FOR CLUES.  
20101221010605.000|20101221010607.000|CC1|>> SO THEY TOOK HER COMPUTER.   
20101221010607.000|20101221010608.000|CC1|THEY HAVE HER COMPUTER IN       
20101221010608.000|20101221010609.000|CC1|CUSTODY?                        
20101221010609.000|20101221010609.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101221010609.000|20101221010612.000|CC1|THEY DO.                        
20101221010612.000|20101221010614.000|CC1|THEY HAVE EVERYTHING THAT IS    
20101221010614.000|20101221010616.000|CC1|PRETTY MUCH OF HERS THAT MAY    
20101221010616.000|20101221010617.000|CC1|LEAD TO SOME POSSIBLE           
20101221010617.000|20101221010618.000|CC1|INFORMATION AND ANY LEADS.      
20101221010618.000|20101221010619.000|CC1|THAT'S CORRECT.                 
20101221010619.000|20101221010621.000|CC1|>> CELESTE, WE HAVE HEARD THAT  
20101221010621.000|20101221010623.000|CC1|YOUR SISTER SENT YOUR MOTHER A  
20101221010623.000|20101221010627.000|CC1|TEXT MESSAGE AT THE BEGINNING OF
20101221010627.000|20101221010628.000|CC1|DECEMBER.                       
20101221010628.000|20101221010629.000|CC1|VERY CONCERNING, THIS TEXT      
20101221010629.000|20101221010630.000|CC1|MESSAGE.                        
20101221010630.000|20101221010634.000|CC1|WHAT CAN YOU TELL US ABOUT THAT?
20101221010634.000|20101221010636.000|CC1|>> MY MOTHER DID FORWARD ME THE 
20101221010636.000|20101221010637.000|CC1|MESSAGE.                        
20101221010637.000|20101221010640.000|CC1|TO ME, I REALLY AM NOT GOING -- 
20101221010640.000|20101221010641.000|CC1|I REALLY AM NOT STRESSING TOO   
20101221010641.000|20101221010643.000|CC1|MUCH ABOUT THAT MESSAGE BECAUSE 
20101221010643.000|20101221010647.000|CC1|THE WAY THE MESSAGE WAS WRITTEN,
20101221010647.000|20101221010649.000|CC1|IT DIDN'T MAKE -- IT'S KIND OF  
20101221010649.000|20101221010651.000|CC1|QUESTIONABLE, IT DIDN'T MAKE    
20101221010651.000|20101221010652.000|CC1|SENSE IN A WAY.                 
20101221010652.000|20101221010654.000|CC1|I DID TELL THE INVESTIGATORS    
20101221010654.000|20101221010656.000|CC1|THIS AS WELL SO THEY'RE GOING TO
20101221010656.000|20101221010657.000|CC1|DEFINITELY LOOK INTO THAT AS    
20101221010657.000|20101221010659.000|CC1|WELL, BUT TO ME, I'M KIND OF    
20101221010659.000|20101221010700.000|CC1|JUST DISMISSING THAT BECAUSE IT 
20101221010700.000|20101221010703.000|CC1|JUST DOESN'T MAKE ANY SENSE.    
20101221010703.000|20101221010706.000|CC1|AND WHEN, YOU KNOW, WHEN YOU'RE 
20101221010706.000|20101221010707.000|CC1|DOING THINGS OR IN A HURRY AND  
20101221010707.000|20101221010709.000|CC1|YOU'RE TEXTING, YOU SOMETIMES   
20101221010709.000|20101221010714.000|CC1|TEND TO MESS UP THE WORDS AND   
20101221010714.000|20101221010715.000|CC1|REALLY, THAT REALLY ISN'T       
20101221010715.000|20101221010716.000|CC1|TELLING ME EXACTLY ANYTHING.    
20101221010716.000|20101221010717.000|CC1|IT COULD BE SEVERAL THINGS.     
20101221010717.000|20101221010718.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE RIGHT.                
20101221010718.000|20101221010719.000|CC1|YOU'RE SO RIGHT.                
20101221010719.000|20101221010720.000|CC1|WE WANT TO SHOW EVERYBODY THIS  
20101221010720.000|20101221010721.000|CC1|TEXT MESSAGE.                   
20101221010721.000|20101221010722.000|CC1|EVERYBODY LOOK AT THIS.         
20101221010722.000|20101221010725.000|CC1|IT SAYS QUOTE, THIS IS A TEXT   
20101221010725.000|20101221010729.000|CC1|MESSAGE THAT DEBBIE FLORES SENT 
20101221010729.000|20101221010730.000|CC1|TO HER MOTHER THE BEGINNING OF  
20101221010730.000|20101221010731.000|CC1|DECEMBER.                       
20101221010731.000|20101221010732.000|CC1|QUOTE, IN CASE THERE IS EVER AN 
20101221010732.000|20101221010734.000|CC1|EMERGENCY WITH ME, CONTACT BLU

20101221014022.000|20101221014023.000|CC1|>> I CAN'T THINK ABOUT GETTING
